name: [Unfinished Tech Demo] Untenable LD49
description:
Very unfinished Ludum Dare 49 attempt! A project I am keen to continue one day.

Narrative based game about trying to balance the mood of two factions, as the president of a collapsing regime. You have to make all the false promises and noises that won't get you killed by either faction, just as long as it takes for your helicopter to arrive...
